messages.subject: Lee-another perspective
messages.msgSnippet: Lee Thanks for the wise words. I have to agree completely with you. Children are different and they learn in different ways. I checked out your website. WHAT A
messages.messageBody:
Lee
Thanks for the wise words. I have to agree completely with you. Children are different and they learn in different ways.
I checked out your website. WHAT A PARADISE! I am green with envy. It is so beautiful there.
Have a great day all-
God bless
Vivian
Mom to three Happy little Monkeys
Austin 10/31/93 Sarah 8/28/95 Emmalee 8/15/00
And loving wife to Randy

**If fifty million people say a foolish thing, it is still a foolish thing.
-Anatole France***




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
